meanings.definition: relating to the perception of bodily movement and position
meanings.sent1: She learns best through kinesthetically engaging activities.
meanings.sent2: The dance class focused on kinesthetically understanding body language.
meanings.sent3: He tried to explain his feelings kinesthetically by mimicking a robot.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a kinesthetically expressive dance of colors.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's movements were kinesthetically graceful and powerful.

meanings.definition: in a way that involves physical movement and sensation
meanings.sent1: She prefers to learn kinesthetically by doing hands-on activities.
meanings.sent2: The children played kinesthetically in the park, running and jumping.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved kinesthetically, mimicking human gestures.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed kinesthetically through the dancer's body.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew kinesthetically through the trees, rustling the leaves.

meanings.definition: using bodily movements to learn or communicate
meanings.sent1: He kinesthetically demonstrated the proper way to throw a ball.
meanings.sent2: The students kinesthetically acted out scenes from the play.
meanings.sent3: The mime kinesthetically conveyed a story without words.
meanings.sent4: She kinesthetically expressed her emotions through dance.
meanings.sent5: The yoga instructor kinesthetically guided the class through poses.
